title: Space Rock
description: Illus. in full color. "The unusual purple rock that Bob has found begins to talk, telling him that it fell out of a space ship and needs Bob's help to return to the planet Kal-dor. The subject matter will help lure problem readers and the simple vocabulary will keep them going. Vivid watercolors will add to children's enjoyment."-- Booklist.
author: Jon Buller
